text: Mangana kuntigina nde yi na naxan yi xili Harabona, na yi a fala mangan xa, a naxa, “Haman yɛtɛɛn bata singan tiden nafala a banxin dɛxɔn ma a Marodoke mangana muxu faɲin singanɲɛ dɛnaxan yi. Na wudin mateen fɔ nɔngɔnna yɛ tonge suulun.” Awa, mangan yi yamarin fi, a naxa, “Haman xa sa singan na yi.”
